welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kopavogur, Iceland's charming coastal city known for its stunning landscape and vibrant culture. Get ready to soak in the beauty and immerse yourself in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay and have a wonderful time exploring all that Kopavogur has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights at Reykjavik Domestic Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Keflavik International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Keflavik International Airport is dedicated to handling international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Keflavik International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
